name: Jack Stapleton
motive: Wants Baskerville inheritance; real name is Roger Baskerville.
alibi: Claims to be a naturalist, often out on the moor.

name: Mr. Barrymore
motive: Protecting his brother-in-law, the escaped convict.
alibi: At Baskerville Hall during the murder; caught signaling the convict.

name: Laura Lyons
motive: Was misled by Stapleton, potential beneficiary of Charles’s will.
alibi: Claims she never went to the meeting with Charles.
